price: (İbrahim gelince) “Sen mi yaptın bunu ilâhlarımıza ey İbrahim!” dediler.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
